info.name: multiscale epidemia simulation
info.description:
Play with parameters in #Common :
- epidemia propagates locally at rate #Contag per step.
- a proportion #Travel of people travel to the distant areas per step ( and might have a higher #ContagG )
- Step: delay between time steps, to slow down simulation.

renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A

renderpass.code:
const float Contag = .1,      // probability of local transmission per step
           ContagG = .1,      // probability of transmission for long distance travelers
              Init = .0004,   // initial infection
            Travel = .0001;   // long distance travelers proportion
const int     Step = 7 ,      // time step
              Glob = int(1./sqrt(Travel)); // long distance modeled as a coarse grid
     
#define R          iResolution.xy
#define T(U)       texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(mod(U,R)),0)
#define hash(p)  ( 1. - fract(sin(dot(p, vec2(12.9898, 78.233))) * 43758.5453) )
renderpass.name: Common
